title: Updating our HOMEPAGE
body:
On our home page once we connect to our wallets  https://yffs.finance/ You see 4 menus SWAP  - STAKE - VAULT - GOVERNANCE. We should change SWAP to VAULT - YFARM STAKE - YFFS STAKE - GOVERNANCE .  

This would make it much easier to navigate 
 
SWAP   https://swap.yffs.finance/ change to VAULT

STAKE  https://stake.yffs.finance/ change to YFFS STAKE

VAULT  https://vault.yffs.finance/ change to YFARM FARMING

GOVERNANCE   https://yffs.finance/#  update to 2 links below
https://snapshot.page/#/yffs
https://snapshot.page/#/yfarm

changing the homepage to just a connect button and removing the current rocket homepage since there are a lot of complaints in TG group

MUST -- we also need to update all the APYs in all our pages since the inaccuracy makes new users think this is a scam or they are being lied to.  they expect these Crazy APYs and are greeted by smaller returns
author: 0xeeFDA9DfaB30370f68B945aca37A8ff7300dd554
